title: Kind Of Blue: The Making Of The Miles Davis Masterpiece
description: This critically and commercially acclaimed tribute to the most popular jazz album of all time is now available in paperback. With transcriptions of the unedited session tapes; in-depth interviews with musicians; freshly discovered Columbia Records files; never-before-seen photographs; and a foreword by the last surviving member of the band, drummer Jimmy Cobb, Kind of Blue is a vital piece of music historyâ€”and will be essential for fans and scholars for years to come.
author: Ashley Kahn
